Behold<S>1492</S>, what manner<S>4217</S> of love<S>26</S> the Father<S>3962</S> hath bestowed<S>1325</S> upon us<S>2254</S>, that<S>2443</S> we should be called<S>2564</S> the sons<S>5043</S> of God<S>2316</S>: therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> the world<S>2889</S> knoweth<S>1097</S> us<S>2248</S> not<S>3756</S>, because<S>3754</S> it knew<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>.
Beloved<S>27</S>, now<S>3568</S> are we<S>2070</S> the sons<S>5043</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> it doth<S>5319</S> not yet<S>3768</S> appear<S>5319</S> what<S>5101</S> we shall be<S>2071</S>: but<S>1161</S> we know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S>, when<S>1437</S> he shall appear<S>5319</S>, we shall be<S>2071</S> like<S>3664</S> him<S>846</S>; for<S>3754</S> we shall see<S>3700</S> him<S>846</S> as<S>2531</S> he is<S>2076</S>.
And<S>2532</S> every man<S>3956</S> that hath<S>2192</S> this<S>5026</S> hope<S>1680</S> in<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> purifieth<S>48</S> himself<S>1438</S>, even as<S>2531</S> he<S>1565</S> is<S>2076</S> pure<S>53</S>.
Whosoever<S>3956</S> committeth<S>4160</S> sin<S>266</S> transgresseth<S>4160</S> <S>458</S> also<S>2532</S> the law<S>458</S>: for<S>2532</S> sin<S>266</S> is<S>2076</S> the transgression of the law<S>458</S>.
And<S>2532</S> ye know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> he<S>1565</S> was manifested<S>5319</S> to<S>2443</S> take away<S>142</S> our<S>2257</S> sins<S>266</S>; and<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> no<S>3756</S> sin<S>266</S>.
Whosoever<S>3956</S> abideth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S> sinneth<S>264</S> not<S>3756</S>: whosoever<S>3956</S> sinneth<S>264</S> hath<S>3708</S> not<S>3756</S> seen<S>3708</S> him<S>846</S>, neither<S>3761</S> known<S>1097</S> him<S>846</S>.
Little children<S>5040</S>, let<S>4105</S> no man<S>3367</S> deceive<S>4105</S> you<S>5209</S>: he that doeth<S>4160</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> is<S>2076</S> righteous<S>1342</S>, even as<S>2531</S> he<S>1565</S> is<S>2076</S> righteous<S>1342</S>.
He that committeth<S>4160</S> sin<S>266</S> is<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> the devil<S>1228</S>; for<S>3754</S> the devil<S>1228</S> sinneth<S>264</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>. For<S>1519</S> this purpose<S>5124</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S> was manifested<S>5319</S>, that<S>2443</S> he might destroy<S>3089</S> the works<S>2041</S> of the devil<S>1228</S>.
Whosoever<S>3956</S> is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S> doth<S>4160</S> not<S>3756</S> commit sin<S>266</S>; for<S>3754</S> his<S>846</S> seed<S>4690</S> remaineth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> he cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> sin<S>264</S>, because<S>3754</S> he is born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>.
In<S>1722</S> this<S>5129</S> the children<S>5043</S> of God<S>2316</S> are<S>2076</S> manifest<S>5318</S>, and<S>2532</S> the children<S>5043</S> of the devil<S>1228</S>: whosoever<S>3956</S> doeth<S>4160</S> not<S>3361</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> God<S>2316</S>, neither<S>2532</S> he that loveth<S>25</S> not<S>3361</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S>.
For<S>3754</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the message<S>31</S> that<S>3739</S> ye heard<S>191</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S>, that<S>2443</S> we should love<S>25</S> one another<S>240</S>. <sup>message: or, commandment</sup>
Not<S>3756</S> as<S>2531</S> Cain<S>2535</S>, who was<S>2258</S> of<S>1537</S> that wicked one<S>4190</S>, and<S>2532</S> slew<S>4969</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S>. And<S>2532</S> wherefore<S>5484</S> <S>5101</S> slew<S>4969</S> he him<S>846</S>? Because<S>3754</S> his own<S>846</S> works<S>2041</S> were<S>2258</S> evil<S>4190</S>, and<S>1161</S> his<S>846</S> brother's<S>80</S> righteous<S>1342</S>.
Marvel<S>2296</S> not<S>3361</S>, my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>, if<S>1487</S> the world<S>2889</S> hate<S>3404</S> you<S>5209</S>.
We know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> we<S>2249</S> have passed<S>3327</S> from<S>1537</S> death<S>2288</S> unto<S>1519</S> life<S>2222</S>, because<S>3754</S> we love<S>25</S> the brethren<S>80</S>. He that loveth<S>25</S> not<S>3361</S> his brother<S>80</S> abideth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> death<S>2288</S>.
Whosoever<S>3956</S> hateth<S>3404</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> is<S>2076</S> a murderer<S>443</S>: and<S>2532</S> ye know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> no<S>3756</S> <S>3956</S> murderer<S>443</S> hath<S>2192</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S> abiding<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>.
Hereby<S>1722</S> <S>5129</S> perceive we<S>1097</S> the love<S>26</S> of God, because<S>3754</S> he<S>1565</S> laid down<S>5087</S> his<S>846</S> life<S>5590</S> for<S>5228</S> us<S>2257</S>: and<S>2532</S> we<S>2249</S> ought<S>3784</S> to lay down<S>5087</S> our lives<S>5590</S> for<S>5228</S> the brethren<S>80</S>.
But<S>1161</S> whoso<S>3739</S> <S>302</S> hath<S>2192</S> this world's<S>2889</S> good<S>979</S>, and<S>2532</S> seeth<S>2334</S> his<S>846</S> brother<S>80</S> have<S>2192</S> need<S>5532</S>, and<S>2532</S> shutteth up<S>2808</S> his<S>846</S> bowels<S>4698</S> of compassion from<S>575</S> him<S>846</S>, how<S>4459</S> dwelleth<S>3306</S> the love<S>26</S> of God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>?
My<S>3450</S> little children<S>5040</S>, let us<S>25</S> not<S>3361</S> love<S>25</S> in word<S>3056</S>, neither<S>3366</S> in tongue<S>1100</S>; but<S>235</S> in deed<S>2041</S> and<S>2532</S> in truth<S>225</S>.
And<S>2532</S> hereby<S>1722</S> <S>5129</S> we know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> we are<S>2070</S> of<S>1537</S> the truth<S>225</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall assure<S>3982</S> our<S>2257</S> hearts<S>2588</S> before<S>1715</S> him<S>846</S>. <sup>assure: Gr. persuade</sup>
For<S>3754</S> if<S>1437</S> our<S>2257</S> heart<S>2588</S> condemn us<S>2607</S>,<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> greater<S>3187</S> than our<S>2257</S> heart<S>2588</S>, and<S>2532</S> knoweth<S>1097</S> all things<S>3956</S>.
Beloved<S>27</S>, if<S>3362</S> our<S>2257</S> heart<S>2588</S> condemn<S>2607</S> us<S>2257</S> not<S>3362</S>, then have we<S>2192</S> confidence<S>3954</S> toward<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> whatsoever<S>3739</S> <S>1437</S> we ask<S>154</S>, we receive<S>2983</S> of<S>3844</S> him<S>846</S>, because<S>3754</S> we keep<S>5083</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S>, and<S>2532</S> do<S>4160</S> those things that are pleasing<S>701</S> in his<S>846</S> sight<S>1799</S>.
And<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> his<S>846</S> commandment<S>1785</S>, That<S>2443</S> we should believe<S>4100</S> on the name<S>3686</S> of his<S>846</S> Son<S>5207</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, and<S>2532</S> love<S>25</S> one another<S>240</S>, as<S>2531</S> he gave<S>1325</S> us<S>2254</S> commandment<S>1785</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he that keepeth<S>5083</S> his<S>846</S> commandments<S>1785</S> dwelleth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>. And<S>2532</S> hereby<S>1722</S> <S>5129</S> we know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> he abideth<S>3306</S> in<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>, by<S>1537</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> which<S>3739</S> he hath given<S>1325</S> us<S>2254</S>.
